mapper.select: SELECT id, wh_id, contact, tel, phone, email, country_code, state, city, zip_code, street, address1, address2, address3, company_name, inner_org_id FROM wh_details where id = #{id}
SELECT id, wh_id, contact, tel, phone, email, country_code, state, city, zip_code, street, address1, address2, address3, company_name, inner_org_id FROM wh_details where 1 = 1
